backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of key frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode values, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering DeckViewer and global toast provider.
frontend/src/components/deck/BulkImageUp: Component for uploading multiple images and auto‑assigning them to predefined slide order.
frontend/src/components/deck/DeckNavigat: Sidebar navigator providing slide navigation buttons and thumbnails.
Main layout combining header, slide preview, navigation, image tools, export button, and footer.
frontend/src/components/deck/ExportPptxB: Export button that triggers PPTX generation and shows status toasts.
frontend/src/components/deck/icons.tsx: Maps slide IDs to lucide-react icons and exports a lookup helper for retrieving the appropriate icon.
frontend/src/components/deck/imageUrlUti: Classifies image URLs, generates guidance and error messages, and provides placeholder text for export scenarios.
frontend/src/components/deck/RemoteImage: Image renderer with loading states, error handling, and special logic for non-direct URLs.
frontend/src/components/deck/SlideCanvas: Renders a full slide preview with themed layout, title, bullets, optional image, and slide number based on slide type.
frontend/src/components/deck/SlideImageF: Provides UI to add, upload, edit, or remove images and captions for a slide, syncing changes with deck state.
frontend/src/components/deck/ThumbnailIt: Displays a compact clickable slide thumbnail with icon, title, and first bullet, highlighting the active slide.
frontend/src/components/deck/useDeckStat: Defines Zustand store for managing current slide and per-slide images, including defaults and bulk updates.
frontend/src/content/slides.ts: Exports static slide definitions containing IDs, titles, bullet points, and slide types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity with automatic query invalidation on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future backend query hooks; exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, root color variables, dark mode theming, and base styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pptx/exportDeckToPptx.ts: Generates an HTML-based export of the slide deck, embedding images when possible and adding warnings for non-embeddable URLs.
frontend/src/pptx/imageEmbedding.ts: Empty module reserved for future PPTX image embedding logic.
frontend/src/pptx/pptxgenjs.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration placeholder for pptxgenjs integration.
frontend/src/styles/deckTheme.ts: Defines a minimal white-and-blue slide theme with fonts, colors, spacing, and sizing constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom color variables, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, requirements, design rules, known issues, and feature descriptions for the slide deck system.
